title: Sleuth (1972 Thriller film) If it was murder, where's the body?  Laurence Olivier, Michael Cain

sources.title: Sleuth (1972 Thriller film) If it was murder, where's the body?  Laurence Olivier, Michael Cain
sources.description:
Two acting legends. One mansion. Zero rules.
Mystery writer Andrew Wyke lures his wife's new flame Milo Tindle into a twisted game at his tricked-out mansion. Their battle of wits escalates wildly as traps backfire and disguises drop, turning a playful face-off into a no-holds-barred showdown.

CASTLIST:
Laurence Olivier (Oscar¬Æ-nominated) - Andrew Wyke
Michael Cain (Oscar¬Æ-nominated) - Milo Tindle
Teddy Martin - Police Constable Higgs
Alec Cawthorne - Inspector Doppler (voice)
Joanne Woodward - Marguerite Wyke (portrait only)

CREDITS
Directed by 4x Oscar¬Æ winner Joseph L. Mankiewicz (All About Eve)
Based on Anthony Shaffer‚Äôs Tony-winning play
Cinematography by Oswald Morris ‚Ä¢ Production Design by Ken Adam (James Bond films)
